content: I think I'll price my old tripod competitively, but also highlight its excellent condition and the fact that it's been well-maintained. I'll research similar listings online and add 10-20% to the average market value to reflect its quality. Thanks for the advice! By the way, I also ordered a new remote shutter release online on February 5th, after I realized I lost my old one during a photo walk. It's been working great so far.
